snippet: India have learnt their lessons from the debacle in Pune and will not repeat the mistakes in the second test against Australia, captain Virat Kohli said on Friday....

headline.main: US Admiral in Disputed South China Sea: 'We Will Be Here'
headline.print_headline: US Admiral in Disputed South China Sea: 'We Will Be Here'

lead_paragraph: India have learnt their lessons from the debacle in Pune and will not repeat the mistakes in the second test against Australia, captain Virat Kohli said on Friday.
